item.title: ZENA Stock Gained In Pre-Market Today – What Is The New DaaS Deal About?
item.description: The company announced a deal to acquire a Virginia-based land surveying company with a customer base across the Washington, D.C. metro area.

item.title: Is Bitcoin Ready To Test $80K Again? Traders Are Watching Liquidation Signals, US Economic Data
item.description: Analysts warned that a data-heavy macro calendar, weak risk appetite, and lingering technical pressures continue to raise volatility risks for crypto ...

item.title: TTD Stock Is Falling Today: KeyBanc Slashes Price Target By Over 50%, Flags Tougher Growth Outlook
item.description: According to TheFly, KeyBanc reduced its price target for The Trade Desk to $40 from $88, while maintaining its ‘Overweight’ rating on the shares.

item.title: CYN Stock Is Surging Pre-Market — What's The Nvidia Connection?
item.description: Cyngn teams up with Nvidia to develop a simulation environment of a high-fidelity digital warehouse for testing and refining its automation software.

item.title: Why Did PDYN Stock Pop Over 10% In Pre-Market Today?
item.description: The company signed an agreement with a major U.S. defense prime contractor to supply a subsystem that supports missile propulsion.
